text: Margaret Juntwait (March 18, 1957 - June 3, 2015) was an American radio broadcaster. She was the voice of the Metropolitan Opera radio broadcasts from December 11, 2004, replacing Peter Allen when he retired after 29 years. Juntwait was born in Ridgewood, New Jersey. She grew up in Upper Saddle River. She was married to Jamie Katz and had four children. Juntwait died from ovarian cancer on June 3, 2015 in Saddle River, aged 58. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American radio personalities Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:People from Ridgewood, New Jersey
title: Margaret Juntwait
